db:abstract.db:para: Wraps the most important methods of Android Parcel class.

db:para.db:emphasis: This class is under development and is subject to change.

db:abstract.db:para: This class was introduced in Qt 6.2.

db:para.db:emphasis: This class is under development and is subject to change.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: The QAndroidParcel is a convenience class that wraps the most important Android Parcel methods.

db:section.db:title: int QAndroidParcel::handle() const
db:section.db:para: The return value is useful to call other Java API which are not covered by this wrapper

db:section.db:title: QAndroidBinder QAndroidParcel::readBinder() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the binder as a QAndroidBinder

db:section.db:title: QByteArray QAndroidParcel::readData() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the data as a QByteArray

db:section.db:title: QVariant QAndroidParcel::readVariant() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the data as a QVariant

db:section.db:title: void QAndroidParcel::writeBinder(const QAndroidBinder &binder) const
db:section.db:para: Writes a binder object. This is useful for a client to send to a server a binder which can be used by the server callback the client.

db:section.db:title: void QAndroidParcel::writeData(const QByteArray &data) const
db:section.db:para: Writes the provided data as a byte array

db:section.db:title: void QAndroidParcel::writeVariant(const QVariant &value) const
db:section.db:para: Writes the provided value. The value is converted into a QByteArray before is written.
